line.comment: * if not $ship-> get amount of ware $license in cargo bay
* $time = get in-game date string: time= $playtime include time= [TRUE]
* START [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.SendMessage' : message=$t log=[TRUE] forceDisplay=[FALSE] delayMs=10000 author=null

line.text: 's thank you for uncovering a smuggler!'

sval.val: s thank you for uncovering a smuggler!
if not $ship-> get amount of ware $license in cargo bay
$time = get in-game date string: time= $playtime include time= [TRUE]
START [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.SendMessage' : message=$t log=[TRUE] forceDisplay=[FALSE] delayMs=10000 author=null
